website_summaries.verdict: This full-tang knife set offers a classic, triple-riveted look and comes with a simple wooden block.
pros: With 18 pieces, including 8 steak knives and a knife sharpener, this is an affordable set that will meet most kitchen needs
A budget knife set that will look good in any kitchen
cons: Block is prone to drying out and splitting, but this can be prevented with a bit of mineral oil

customer_reviews.title: jeff@lambville.com
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first set because the block arrived with a missing foot. I am about to return the second set. I've only had them for two weeks. I hand-wash and dry them immediately after use. However, they're starting to rust. The description says "high quality stainless steel". I take exception to the "high quality" part. After I return these, I'll order some Chicago Cutlery knives. I give these two stars because these are very sharp and seem well-balanced. -3 stars for rust and QC problems (missing foot)
customer_reviews.author: JLDizzy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad starter set if you can't afford good knives. I recently moved into my own apartment leaving behind the Henkle knives I'm used to working with so I am used to higher quality knives. I've been using the Amazon knives for a little over a month now and I have 2 complaints. 1. The kitchen shears provided are a disappointment. They are difficult to put together/take a part and just feel low quality. 2. The knives need sharpened frequently. Overall these knives or just ok if you are used to quality knives. If you are used to using super cheap knives these will be an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Missing serrations
customer_reviews.text: 1 of 8 steak knives is missing more than half of the serrations (see pics). We don't often use more than 2 knives so unfortunately we just discovered the problem. This was a Christmas gift for my wife so I am not very happy. Shame on Amazon Basics. 5/5/19 edit - steak knives are not very good. Most meat is shredded even when cutting with the grain. Other knives are okay but we will be buying a new set of just steak knives that are not Amazon brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal!  (Steel?)
customer_reviews.text: Okay so truthfully I've had these knives about a year and haven't had any disappointments really. No rust, got the job done for a guy trying to cut what he needs in the kitchen. All the sudden, trying to cut some crusty sourdough- too much for these knives! It literally just bent and broke. Not truly a full tang at all it is a different kind of very soft metal in the handle that really is a just an outline as you can see! I'm upset I wasted my money. Can't even handle homemade bread. I'd ask for a refund but my year is up?
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Loses sharpness fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old set that had wooden handles which became warped. I use the paring knife most often, but it will not hold an edge. I have a sharpening kit which I used on the old set, and they kept sharp as expected. But even after sharpening these knives (particularly the paring knife) I couldn't easily slice a tomato without first puncturing the tomato where I wanted to slice it. I still have my old set, and they stay sharp much longer, and slice tomatoes like a knife through butter. I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phx85021

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. Very sharp. Feel good in the hand. Heavy. I hand wash them, so not sure if they would rust or not in the dishwasher like my last set of knives. I like the variety in this set and the number of steak knives ( so we don't have to share them at the table anymore). The only thing I don't like is that they aren't angled enough in the block. I have to slide the block out or tilt it down to get the knives out when they are on the counter with upper cabinets above them, which I didn't have to do with my last block, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: A knife BROKE cutting Paper from a ham
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated the knife set until one knife broke when my 76 years of age mother attempted to cut open cellophane paper on a ham. The results are in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Baddog6915

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by no means the sharpest knives I've ever used nor are they the best knives. However, these are the best absolute value set of knives I've ever bought. I got this set around $55 and use it almost daily. If you recently just started learning how to cook, these are more than enough knives you'll ever need in the kitchen. They're sharp and came without issues. The bamboo block and knives both came in great condition despite some reviewers mentioning they had issues. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Wow! A great knife set at a bargain price. Only cheap part is the sharpening steal
customer_reviews.text: Knives are well made, durable, needing only light sharpening upon arrival. Great weight, balance, comfortable handle, and becomes an extension of your arm over time. The wife believes the paring knife is too big and heavy and prefers her Victorinox paring knife. Otherwise a great set. Even the steak knifes are heavy duty, and sharp, no struggling to work around the bone on your T-bone. Only cheap item is the sharpening steal, but just replaced it with my own.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hedger

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not outstanding knives
customer_reviews.text: These are decent but not outstanding knives, they are higher quality than most department store brands but not so expensive a meltdown is warranted over a family member putting them in the dish washer. I'm still going to buy a set of Wusthof classic knives but since my family doesn't comprehend the meaning of "hand wish only" they be relegated to using these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: OK product and good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The chefs and larger knives are fine. The steak and paring knives leave much to be desired in the way they handle and cut. Knife block ok but a greater slant would allow them to be put back further on the kitchen counter and be able to take the knives in and out without bumping into the overhead cabinet. All and all an uninspiring set but fit for use.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal! I bought these for a vacation home thinking it would be just so-so in quality. But these are almost as good as the Wusthof brand knives. Super sharp and heavy. The Wood block doesn't look sealed, but that's the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Donovan

customer_reviews.title: One-Click order mistake turned love!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old discovered one click ordering and ordered this set of knives. I didn't know I was receiving them until I got the shipment email. They seemed like good quality when they arrived so I decided to keep them, I was in need of a few knives anyway! I must say being the "Amazon Basics" brand I was skeptical but its been almost a year and they have held up and I really like the chopping and slicing knives! Great (accidental) find
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife Set at any cost (but the $42 open box price sealed it).
customer_reviews.text: My old knife set was from 20+ years ago and they weren't that great to start with (and since they were cheap, they couldn't be sharpened). This is my 2nd set of Amazon Basic's knife set and I would recommend them to anyone/everyone that will listen. I see several knife sets for $300, $600, $1,000 or even $1,500 from other stores/brands and I really couldn't tell you the difference. (And with the affordable price of Amazon Basic's knife set, I can use all that money I saved to outfit the rest of the kitchen).
customer_reviews.author: Lil e

customer_reviews.title: Compares extremely well with comparably priced stuff from big box world
customer_reviews.text: The handles are uncomfortably square, and could do with more rounding, but on the whole this is a killer knife set for the money. The knife block looks a lot better than I was expecting, and the whole thing is really quite an improvement over the old Walmart stuff it replaced. This probably doesn't compare to $300+ stuff all that favorably, but it compares extremely well with comparably priced stuff from big box world.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michael McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Very good - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set 2 1/2 years ago. I have never regretted it. The knives are very high quality for such a low price. They sharpen up well. They are very durable and look great. I can't tell any difference in the way they look after all of those washings in the sink and dishwasher. The five stars represents a quality/value calculation. These knives are not the highest quality you can get, but they are by far the best you can get for this price.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good knife set
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo scared to buy some Amazon Basics knives! Sadly I was being a little superficial, I didn't want my block to have the words "amazon basics" burnt into it. Luckily that's on that front or the side that will be facing the wall. I was impressed with the knives. They're a comfortable weight that's well balanced in your hands. Nice sharp edge and the knife sharpener is basic, but if you know how to use it correctly it'll get the job done. The only thing I don't like is that the steak knives aren't smooth edges. So they don't cut smoothly, kind of rips the meat apart. Other than that it's a good set.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benson

customer_reviews.title: kitchen knife set for my parents - they love it and I do too
customer_reviews.text: My parents had a 20-30yr old plastic cheap K-mart set of knives that were horrific to cut anything with. I purchased this for them as my mom loves cooking and my dad and I like eating ... our pork tenderloins, chicken and steaks are easily cut and my mom has her way with fruits and vegetables. This set makes the job of cooking preparation and eating easier. I'd buy it again if need be, but I expect this set to last the rest of their lives.
customer_reviews.author: James Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: My husband ruined my really expensive knives, bless him, and I needed something quick. I love all the other amazon basics products that I have ever ordered, and even though this is a very different product I decided to give it a whirl. I am not disappointed. These are sharp, and come in a nice wood block. There are tons of choices and they are nice and thick and durable. I also stick them in the dishwasher against recommendations and they are fine, the heat just changed the handle color a bit. For the price and durability I would buy them again five times over!!
customer_reviews.author: rlp219

customer_reviews.title: ... set of butcher block knives and these are of excellent quality, especially if you consider the price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new set of butcher block knives and these are of excellent quality, especially if you consider the price... My wife complained that our old set of knives were "tore up and dull, and a dull set of knives are dangerous". i guess she was hinting that it was time for a replacement. Now she mentions that these new knives are so sharp that she's nicked her finger a time or two. A nice problem to have IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzie

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Set For Someone Who Doesn't Have Knives (or doesn't know how to cook)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward set. Nothing here is going to blow your mind if you're really into cooking. But if you need a knife set for someone who just has dull knives they bought at Goodwill or someone who has limited utensils? This is perfect. Comes with the Knife block as well as an added bonus. They do what they need to do and you won't break the bank. Just don't expect super high quality knives.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty / Great Quality Knives
customer_reviews.text: I found myself buying knife block sets regularly because nothing under $200 lasts these days, until I purchased these. They are nice and weighed. Great quality and long lasting if taken care of property (hand wash and dry, don't put in dishwasher or you could rust them). I am very pleased with these. I am becoming a true believer of Amazon Basics products, so far everything I order exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.author: MelanieR.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set at an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new knife set and stumbled across these. Based on the other reviews I decided to give them a try based on those reviews and the price point. These are five stars all the way for this price point and probably for twice as much. They have good balance, a nice substantial feel and a sharp edge. Based on this purchase I'm making Amazon Basic my first stop for kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: NV Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My knife set was ancient and really need to be replaced, so I ordered these thinking these would be fine until I could order something better. However I’m very pleased with the quality so far and actually think they will be sturdy enough to last me some time. I’m pleasantly surprised with the duribility and quality.
customer_reviews.author: FairReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months I am very please with the sharpness and overall appearance of this set. I was very sceptical about the price but am now pleasantly surprised at how well they cut and the selection of different knives.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Very sharp stainless blades that take a new edge with a sharpening stone. I would steer clear of the honing steel. Like most others in these types of sets they are too short and lack heft. If you want to keep the blades sharp, get yourself a sharpening stone and a serious professional sized honing rod. Be careful with the hone. The blades of the knives are SHARP.
customer_reviews.author: FDC

customer_reviews.title: very decent set for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: pretty impressed with the set for the price, nice sturdy handles, i would say the blades are medium thickness but expected for this price. I was ready to open, be disappointed and return. I would not use in my house but bought for our motorhome, and I only say this because I don't want my expensive knives in my motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Great knives for an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, excited as this set is very inexpensive, while still providing a very good quality build. The knife quality is sturdy, well balanced. Your getting much more than you’re paying for. Only thing hat kept me from giving a 5 Star was I did get one knife, the large chefs knife, that was bent / curved (pictured). It is still useable and very sharp. But again hard to complain too much for sub $60. And would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sabatier

customer_reviews.title: 18 piece knife set with 17 slots
customer_reviews.text: The whole knife set is great! The block is attractive and the knives are sharp and work well. My only concern is that we were sent a defective knife block, only 17 slots! It's missing an area underneath the sharpener. It doesn't affect the look of it much, just have to find space for the 18th knife in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not straight edge
customer_reviews.text: They ok too many steak knives I told my wife not to get these. Now that she looks at them closely she doesn't like them she wanted straight edge not serrated knives. Comes with 8 of them and only 6 straight edge. They ok just a heads up
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: will not stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: I have had these knives 5 years I cannot get them sharp enough to slice a tomato, I looked through all questions and reviews and no one has an answer on how to keep the knives sharp......I dont use the knives very often....I'm going to try an electric sharpener before I buy a new set
customer_reviews.author: E. Money

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price! I'm no pro!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional chef but I certainly pretend to be one when I'm cooking! And what does a pretend chef need but pretend chef knives! These work great, I don't cut lightning fast so I don't need something that will cut my fingers off anyways. I am a steady as it goes kind of chef who enjoys experimenting with ingredients. Needless to say these fit the bill Pros -Lots of different knives for every occasion -The knives are quite sharp -Very good quality for the price Cons -Wood block is a little cheap-o but no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value, accidental purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! I've had these for about 5 months and I use them every day. Other than not being dishwasher safe, these work great and I love them! However, I accidentally bought them without realizing they were "amazon brand" - I highly recommend not buying into this brand and supporting a smaller company. I learned my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good option for those that want decent knives without paying ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good option for those that want decent knives without paying high-end prices. My only complaint is that I wish the block was slanted forward more to where the knives in the back of the block do not hit the overhead cabinet when you pull them out. This won't be an issue for you if the counter you intend on putting this on does not have an overhead cabinet. I wouldn't let this be the deciding factor to talk you out of buying them. The important thing is that the knives are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knive are great, had some problems with the knife block
customer_reviews.text: We really like these knives. They cut well, seem very sturdy, and we've been able to easily keep them sharp. The only problem I've had is the front part of he the knife block (the steak knife holding section, you can see it's shorter than the rest of the block) came completely unglued. I was able to glue it back in place with some wood glue, and it has held up, but I figure it will come off again eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house and wanted a nice knife set for my new kitchen. This had great reviews and the price was right. I think all the other reviews cover the attributes well, but I appreciate that this has a variety of knives and they are sharp! They're great and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value, excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace an old cheap set that we’ve had for several years and couldn’t be happier. Quality is way beyond what we expected, arguably better than another set we considered that was 3x as expensive. These knives are very solid, have a nice feel in your hand and are well balanced. Blades are as sharp as you’d want and the set arrived in less than 24 hrs in flawless condition. At this price, you can’t go wrong with this set. I would be proud to give these as a gift too. Would be a great starter set for a new couple or anyone moving out on their own for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product  greatly exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality. Had been looking at knife sets for about a month and was looking at paying around $300 for a small set I read the reviews in these and took a chance expecting I would be returning them as soon as they arrived. Was I wrong. Very good quality and construction. I was blown away by them and at the price. The only downside is they are not dishwasher safe. But then again neither is any real quality knife I have found. Amazing product and amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Humes

customer_reviews.title: These knives are great
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great! I use the paring knife alot so far, and I've had to sharpen it a few times (like you will with any knife), but it's easy to sharpen with the sharpener I have and holds and edge pretty decently. All in all, a fairly great knife set.
customer_reviews.author: Donnell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great knives for a first apartment durable don’t bend when using halls keep you safe only had wash tho and I would use soft sponge on handle because if you use abrasive sponge side it scratches plastic and starts to make it look like there’s a film
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You're probably better off ordering a decent $30 chef's knife and $10 ...
customer_reviews.text: You're probably better off ordering a decent $30 chef's knife and $10 paring knife. These knives are okay but don't really go above and beyond by any metric.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Another AmazonBasics hits for those needed a good set of knives without a lot of dough to spend
customer_reviews.text: I'm not chef, by far, but these are some pretty good quality knives. The knives are replacing a set I got from an old order by mail company a couple of decades ago. Not being a chef, the old knives were OK, but they were sure dated. I didn't want to spend hundreds for knives I would use occasionally in my bachelor lifestyle. These seem to fit the bill for me. The quality is pretty nice and feel OK in hand. Again, since I'm not spending hours preparing food, these are a fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great and very solid set of knives
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 11-year-old because he absolutely loves to cook. He was delighted to have his own set of knives. We put the steak knives away and got him a knife roll for the rest of them. I expect they're going to last him for years--they are nice and heavy and keep an edge well. I'd stack them up against my Henckels set any day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew_The_First

customer_reviews.title: DULL! DULL! DULL!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to like these knives-I've had them about a year-they are a nice weight and haven't rusted even in the dishwasher but they are DULL! I've sharpened them repeatedly and they are just dull as in won’t even cut through a dinner roll dull. My husband use to be a butcher and has used a stone to get them at least functional, but we have to sharpen them every time we use them and it’s frustrating So now I'll be spending to get a set that is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Ssmelb

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised high quality
customer_reviews.text: These knives are nice, especially considering the price. I have some wustoffs, Kamikotos and higher end knives and these knives are right there with them. I bought these for my sister and whenever I'm over her house using them, I'm reminded how nice they are and amazed that they were so cheap. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: ... for my mother last Christmas and she is still super pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother last Christmas and she is still super pleased with it. I initially had some concerns about rusting being an issue. But these concerns were unfounded. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Happily replaced our Wolfgang Puck knives with these
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our Wolfgang Puck knives with this set. Surprised how nice these are. Honestly, I feel they are on par in quality with the Wolfgang Puck knives, but the price is amazing. I've only had them in use for a week, but so far so good. I never put knives in the dishwasher, so I'm sure these will hold up for a long time. My only complaint would be the boning knife doesn't seem very flexible, but it's one of my least used tools, so no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mark

customer_reviews.title: Knives that hold an edge, Block that needs more of an angle
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality nice for the price. I've had it 3 months and it has kept a sharp edge much longer than I expected. Minus one star because the block angle is too vertical. If the block is placed under standard height cabinets, you won't be able to pull out the longer knives. We have to move the block out from under the cabinets to get the knives out. Suggestion to Amazon... angle the block a bit more. (I might shave off the bottom a bit to angle it more.)
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set for $50
customer_reviews.text: These knifes are a little heavier than other cheaper knives because they’re solid, tough, sharp, and easy to clean. The best knife set for $50 bucks. I’m not a chef my wife and I cook during the week for our family. We have gone through two brands of knifes before buying these. The other two brands broke after a year of use. I highly recommend them for family’s or as a gift
customer_reviews.author: raymond soliz

customer_reviews.title: Lot of quality for a value knife block set
customer_reviews.text: These knives are way underpriced. They are sharp, perfectly weighted, full tanged, and look pretty cool to boot. I received a Sabatier set as a gift that was twice as much and frankly, these 'basic' knives are clearly better. My only complaint is the shears that are designed to come apart, they can accidentally come loose if opened too far. Other than that, each knife and the block are a huge plus for starters needing a quality set of knives.
customer_reviews.author: wheezal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality all the way around
customer_reviews.text: These knives were a Prime Day Deal but they are definitely a cut above the rest for the price. Excellent quality all the way around. I highly recommend them. Did I mention that they are sharp, really sharp?
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it as a Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Amazon Basic knife set for my daughter in her new apartment. Nice set for the money. Full tang, 3 rivet handles. Relatively sharp, but not to my customary honed edge.( ...took just a few passes over the ceramic rods to get them nice) Bolster on Chefs knife was a bit too long to "rock" the blade. Steak Knives are nice, good heft, w/ combo serrated/ straight edge. All in all...Pretty Nice Set and Great Bang for the Buck !
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Best knives for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy.... I had recently moved into my own apartment and I went to make a sandwich and realized I had no knives to cut with. I went to many stores to just find a bundle of knifes that were affordable. This was extremely difficult as all the knife sets were >$100. I hopped on Amazon with not that high of hopes. I bought this affordable set and a couple of days later they arrived. Amazon. You are amazing. I have this nice looking set of knives that preform well for a price that is unbeatable. 5 stars A+. - a VERY satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wenger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with these knives. After about a week of using them the have dulled out bad.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, stays sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed for the quality in the product for the price. Very nice set for cutting, spearing, chopping, or any need. Pairs well with the 4 hour chef, or any blue apron project. I would not recommend putting in the dishwasher to perserve integrity of sharp edge and handle. Easy to wash using some Jet Scrubz scrubbers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price, expect rust
customer_reviews.text: It says stainless but the steak knives began to rust after 6 months. They have a good feel to them and for the price, it's hard to complain too much. The main cutting knives, I make sure to hand dry immediately after washing to help with rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest knives I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives. Very sharp and have great sturdy handles. I haven't had them for long, so I don't know yet how well they hold up but my initial impressions are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional chef. Just a mom who's cooked for her family for over 40 years. Needed a good knife set for a reasonable price and this one fit the bill. Knives are durable and sharp. Block is basic yet attractive. We mostly wash by hand but they have ended up in the dishwasher from time to time and still maintain their edge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than most cheap sets at your local stores.
customer_reviews.text: The knives are great. Easy to keep sharp, and feel pretty good in the hand. The scissors that come with it, can barely cut paper. Not even joking. But the prices for the set is worth finding a different pair of kitchen shears.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special...spend a little more and buy something nicer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas present. I asked about them and my son said they're ok. Several has nicked edges. I wish I would have just bought a nicer set. They're functional.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a pretty crappy set of knives for too long and thought I’d try these and eventually upgrade to a nicer set. These are great! Very sharp and the block was in good shape. I just wish the block angled a bit more to go under my cabinets - I have to slide it out to get the back row of knives, but oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Best Affordable Knives
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never left a review before but needed to add that this is the best set of knives for a home cook. It has everything you need. Also, they do not rust! We get lazy and leave things in the sink a lot. These knives are super tough and have not had any rust! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives ordered them to see if I would like them, loved them very sharp cut myself 5 times the first week, also they are very heavy and durable my husband who was doubtful loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: this knife set is absolutely amazing! I got it on sale for $55
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this knife set is absolutely amazing! I got it on sale for $55, what a bargain! We had been looking for a new knife set for the past year and I am so happy I found this set, had no idea AmazonBasics made one. This knife set is just as nice or nicer than sets costing $200! These knifes made my old set feel like cheap pieces of tin, these new knives are much heavier and feel far better in quality. Great weight to them and they are sharp and a pleasure to use. You can't go wrong here!
customer_reviews.author: JMSamler

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my Mom (they were on her wish list). She loves them!! They're high quality and were definitely an upgrade from the well-loved set of knives she had been using. I accidentally ordered 2 sets and returning the second one was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased hugely expensive knife sets and this one, with its reasonable price, is well worth it. The knives are impeccable and the knife steel included is very helpful to sharpen blades Since all knives require maintenance, this set is well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Eulogia

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price. Impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: Knives are good quality. I had previously purchased a very high quality Japanese knife and sharpener. I always use the sharpener for all my knives. These Amazon knives responded very well. Steak knives are great. You can't miss with this set.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives as a first homeowner set thinking they would do until we could afford a higher quality set. That won't be needed because these knives are great! They're sturdy and very sharp. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal DeSilver

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and a great value
customer_reviews.text: We are really impressed with this knife set. They are good quality and a great value, for the money. Well constructed and solid. I spent entirely too much time researching and reading reviews on various sets... just one-click buy and be done with it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Catcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife set
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife set! Comes with everything I need, although I don't use half of them! Love the quality and the forged handles. They feel comfortable to use and they don't feel cheap, like other knives at this price point. Love that it comes with a block and a set of steak knives!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzieeroo

customer_reviews.title: Wow these are good. This is a great example of 10% of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are good. This is a great example of 10% of the cost of the high end name brand item and yet 90% of the functionality. Holds edge well and feel balances. The downside is the so so kitchen shears but the blades are so good I can easily forgive. We put a quality shears in its place and awe very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely superb!
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives! Very impressed with the build and quality of them and the block itself. Nothing came damaged or dinged or nicked or anything. Honestly, I wasn't expecting more than what the title suggested: BASIC. However, these have the look, weight and feel of a set priced in the $100-$160 range. The blades are stainless steel, are razor sharp and the handles are machined and fitted perfectly. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: K.Leyva

customer_reviews.title: ... had the cheaper 14 piece set and was fairly happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I had the cheaper 14 piece set and was fairly happy with it, but it was missing some blades that I really wanted. This set popped up on a lightning deal and I jumped. I was really surprised at the quality. The 14-piece set was ok for the $25 price tag, but it was nothing special. The knives in this set, on the other hand, feel like much higher end blades. Perfect weight and nicely balanced and really seem to hold a decent edge.
customer_reviews.author: Paranoid

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The knives look durable and well made. The price was very good for what you get. Comparing to my other sets, the block on this one has a steep angle which made if difficult to pull out the knives if you have it under overhanging cabinets, ie, the knives would not slide out of the block because they would hit the cabinet above.
customer_reviews.author: Slingster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is amazing. I was hesitant to buy this product as I was unsure the quality of Amazon Basics line. However, the knives are very sharp and sturdy. I actually got a chance to use them since I bought them last week and they work very well. This is the first set of knives I have owned that feel like they cut as they should. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I know knives. This set is THE bargain of ...
customer_reviews.text: I know knives. This set is THE bargain of the century. You get high quality steel. Full Tang, riveted handled knives. Serrated steak knives and a quality, heavy duty block. I was concerned when I ordered these knives about the heft and the construction. Those concerns were unfounded as I find these knives to be outstanding at this price. Simply can't be beat at this price. Order these knives, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Knives are nice, abel to cleanly cut off the tip of ...
customer_reviews.text: Knives are nice, abel to cleanly cut off the tip of my ring finger before I even noticed...be more careful than I was. The angle the knives enter isn't very conducive to living under a cabinet - can't get the knives in/out while under a cabinet sitting on my counter, other than that small issue they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Rah

customer_reviews.title: Construction of knives is superior for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Construction of knives is superior for the price. Very well balanced. Knives are very sharp. Knife block is well made and is just as shown. Every knife (plus shears) for any cooking need. Very happy with this choice for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, doesn't rust. I bought some wood stain to make the base darker..... I love it so much I bought one for my Mom.
customer_reviews.author: TitaniumSpecial

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift For Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this knife set around Christmas time last year for my mother. She uses them all the time with no issues at all. They are very quick and easy to clean and sharpen. I would definitely recommend this set if you are in need of a Christmas gift for mom!
customer_reviews.author: Serafin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, sharp and good quality knives! So far I like them as much as my Henkels brand knives. The price was low for the quality you get. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Knives!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly these knives are "GOOD". They are not premium $1000 dollar knives, but they are worth their cost. For the price its a very good knife set. They are worth the buy. I had no defects on the product, though I know sometimes it can happen. If you want a nice set without spend top dollar, then get these for the low price.. Nothing special just good knifes.
customer_reviews.author: Naptime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, affordable kitchen knife set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my Mom, to replace a different set of knives that had almost completely fallen apart over a couple of years. Going for best price-to-positive-reviews ratio, I chose this set. After sharpening a few of the knives a little, they look, feel, and perform solidly. I would buy these for a gift again, or when this set is worn, without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: scrapnonz

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great handle, very sharp, strong, and durable. The block could be better, but that's the least of my worries It only remains to be seen how long they stay sharp, but for the time being I'm enjoying cutting paper-thin tomatoes
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at these for a while, and amazon just discounted them so I bought them immediately! Superb quality, love them! But pay attention, because I already cut my fingers a couple of times :/
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a reasonably priced, functional knife block set, this will fill the bill. This set was for my son. I bought a set for myself over 2 years ago and it is still working like the day it arrived. Love this set. Not fancy just works exactly as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vince8

customer_reviews.title: No sharpener. Extra knife
customer_reviews.text: Probably just bad luck. Would return, but I bought on prime day and it's now sold out. Bright side I will eventually have 17 dull knives instead of just 16.
customer_reviews.author: DREW

customer_reviews.title: I am no expert on kitchen knives but bought these recently and so far I am pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick disclosure, I am no expert on kitchen knives but bought these recently and so far I am pleased with the purchase. The knives appear to be well-constructed, nicely finished, and feel good and solid for kitchen use. I could not see any flaws on the knives plus the block is sturdy and nicely finished as well.
customer_reviews.author: xb90

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The blades seem to dull rather quickly and I use the sharpener about every time I use them, but they still need a little extra to get them to cut clean. Overall great bang for the buck and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice attractive and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of knifes. Attractive and sharp. Great selection. Best set I've own, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Worth far more than the selling price!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these knives. Heavy ,yet easy to handle. Sharp so keep away from children (even the little chefs in the making). The only reviews worth reading are the ones that paint a positive picture. Also I would recommend washing and completely drying (using a paper towel or cloth) after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knives are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives! They're sharp, and look very professional. The only thing that isnt great is the scissors which started rusting immediately and aren't terribly sharp. The knives are wonderful and the woodblock is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like them
customer_reviews.text: I was well overdue for a new set of knives!!!!! The first time i used one was two nights ago and the cut was so smooth and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned these knives after one week of use. They did not hold an edge even after one use.
customer_reviews.author: KenC

customer_reviews.title: Amazon basics is taking over the world.
customer_reviews.text: I hate that amazon basics is displacing other companies. Yet a bought these anyways. Good knives.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great. I feel like I got a great expensive set, but I love that I didn't have to spend a fortune. They look great. They cut with ease. I've gotten compliments on how great they are from friends. They always seems shocked when I say Amazon Basics.
customer_reviews.author: Roonil Wazlib

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set
customer_reviews.text: We just replace a cheapo knife block with these. I was skeptical because the price was actually cheaper than the “cheap ones” we were replacing, but the reviews were fantastic so figured we’d give them a try! We are not disappointed. Very sharp. Nice weight. Sleek looking. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Great knives not so good block
customer_reviews.text: Knives are great. Block was split. Block also forces you to pull knives up vertically such that you hit your cabinets if storing the block underneath them. Fix the block and this is 5 star value. Using a drawer knife holder so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON BASICS KNIVES CAN'T BE BEATEN FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are fantastic! Amazon really outdid themselves with the premium knife sets that they offer. High quality blades, incredibly sharp, and have held up phenomenally over the last 6 months since my initial purchase. They haven't needed to be sharpened even once. They are just that good. If you are on a budget and need a great set of knives, look no further. These are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set
customer_reviews.text: Had them about a week and we love them. They are sharp and seem to be great quality
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Premium 18-Piece Kitchen Knife Block Set
feature_bullets: Full tang triple-riveted, ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control
High quality stainless-steel with precision-honed blade for lasting sharpness
Hardwood block included to store and protect knife set

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,142 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
